thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.dialaflight.com
thread.title: cyndy holmes

author: cyndy holmes
title: cyndy holmes
text:
We have used DialAFlight for a number of years and have always found them to be 100% in booking flights and services. Our travel adviser, Carina, is terrific, always very helpful and nothing is too much trouble.
We would not hesitate to recommend DialAFlight to people who are looking to book flights, hotels and holidays as we know they will get an excellent service.
Phil and Cyndy Holmes
